ðŸ“– Summary: Blackbird is an OSINT tool designed to quickly locate user accounts on various platforms using usernames or email addresses. It integrates with WhatsMyName, offers multiple export formats, and includes AI-powered NER to enhance metadata extraction. The tool is intended for use in digital investigations and cybersecurity.
